summary: Alpha stages of my current Arena Mod. Very Limited.
descriptionHtml:
Project is officially discontinued. I hate letting all the hours of work go to waste, but it's not worth finishing at this point. The modding community is a lot smaller than it was in Skyrims first 2 years, and any further work I put into this mod is probably going to go unnoticed. In hindsight, I really should have started modding this immediately after they released the dev kit.

The mod is staying up though because it is still in decent shape. You can fight 10 or so NPC's in the arena, and some are sort of interesting.
LOCATION: Near rorikstead, and should be visible on your map already without discovering it.

Sorry to anyone who's hopes I might have gotten up. Won't be making this same mistake twice tho. Idk what Fallout 4 is going to look like or what tools I'll have at my disposal, but I'll be surprised if they don't release a dev kit that's similar to the one in Skyrim. As soon as they release that I'm going to start development on a new project right away.

Until then I feel like I should promote this guy's arena http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50892/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D50892%26preview%3D&pUp=1

It's pretty good, definitely the best arena on the nexus.
author: Campocalypse
